source.name: Great Plains Trail - Gloss Mountain Loop
source.description: As the traveler enter this Loop, they become aware of the uniqueness of the rugged, high topped mesas springing up from the relatively flat land– they glitter!  They glitter with the brightest hues of red, blue, white, shades of green and golden yellow.
